title: Application of capacitive deionization technology in water treatment and coupling technology: a review
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00413B, Critical Review
Shumin He, Tong Zhu, Youzhao Wang, Wei Xiong, Xiaolong Gao, Enbo Zhang
CDI plays an important role in water desalination, water softening, removal of heavy metals, purification of industrial wastewater, and removal of nutrients, and CDI coupling technology is emphasized.
